name: discourse
tagline: A modern discussion platform for building and hosting online communities
description: Discourse is a modern forum platform built for hosting online communities. It supports real-time notifications, threaded discussions, and plugins, with a responsive UI for mobile and desktop, and can be self-hosted or cloud-managed.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Perfect experience on phones and tablets. Discuss anywhere, anytime

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Stay updated with real-time alerts. Never miss important discussions

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with thousands of plugins. Customize to your needs

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Own your community platform completely. No third-party control over discussions
